long_description: The REI On(R) Air travel pillow wraps around your neck for comfortable support on long plane, train or automobile journeys. Use the On(R) Air valve to easily adjust softness and support with the touch of a button; inflate the pillow with as little as 2 breaths. Machine-washable cover is soft next to skin. Includes a 9 x 5 in. storage pouch.
short_description: The REI On(R) Air travel pillow wraps around your neck for comfortable support on long plane, train or automobile journeys.
